mapper.select: SELECT COLUMN_NAME as dbFieldName, COLUMN_COMMENT as dbFieldTxt, IF(COLUMN_KEY='PRI','Y','N') as dbIsKey, 'Y' as isShowForm, 'Y' as isShowList, 'N' as isRequired, 'N' as isReadOnly, 'N' as isQuery, 'LIKE' as queryType, 'TEXT' as showType FROM information_schema.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = ('quick-boot') AND TABLE_NAME = #{tableName}
